name: Make Your Honor
description:
From a Brazilian Indie Studio:

Red Eye Brasil Indie Games

MAKE YOUR HONOR

Welcome ninja, we are spirits of an ancient people who was annihilated by a Witcher, now we wandered waiting for someone to veagence us! If you want to try, take your shurikens and MAKE IT COUNT

Make Your Honor is a only one life game that's challenge the player to make that one life Count!!

Controls

A,D - movement

Space bar, W - Jump

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse button - Shoot Shuriken

...
Original Idea and Programming:
Diego Almeida de Aguiar
https://diegoalmeidaaguiar.itch.io/

Game and Level Design:
Lucas Araujo Barros Freitas
https://lucas-abfreitas.itch.io
